events.name: onOpenChange
events.description: Handler that is called when the modal's open state changes.
events.description_zh: 在模式的打开状态更改时调用的处理程序。

events.name: onClose
events.description: Handler that is called when the modal is closed.
events.description_zh: 关闭模式时调用的处理程序。

:children.description: The content of the modal. It's usually the `ModalContent`.

size.description: The modal size. This changes the modal `max-width` and `height` (full).
size.description_zh: 模态大小。这将更改模态“max-width”和“height”（完整）。

isOpen.description: Whether the modal is open by default (controlled).
isOpen.description_zh: 默认情况下，模式是否处于打开状态（受控）。

defaultOpen.description: Whether the modal is open by default (uncontrolled).
defaultOpen.description_zh: 默认情况下，模式是否处于打开状态（不受控制）。

isDismissable.description: Whether the modal can be closed by clicking on the overlay or pressing the <Kbd>Esc</Kbd> key.
isDismissable.description_zh: 是否可以通过单击叠加层或按 <Kbd>Esc</Kbd> 键来关闭模式。

isKeyboardDismissDisabled.description: Whether pressing the <Kbd>Esc</Kbd> key to close the modal should be disabled.
isKeyboardDismissDisabled.description_zh: 是否应禁用按 <Kbd>Esc</Kbd> 键关闭模式。

shouldBlockScroll.description: Whether the modal should block the scroll of the page on open.
shouldBlockScroll.description_zh: 模式是否应在打开时阻止页面滚动。

hideCloseButton.description: Whether to hide the modal close button.
hideCloseButton.description_zh: 是否隐藏模式关闭按钮。

:closeButton.description: Custom close button to display on top right corner.
:closeButton.description_zh: 自定义关闭按钮显示在右上角。

:motionProps.description: The props to modify the framer motion animation. Use the `variants` API to create your own animation.
:motionProps.description_zh: 用于修改成帧器运动动画的道具。使用“变体”API 创建您自己的动画。

:portalContainer.description: The container element in which the overlay portal will be placed.
:portalContainer.description_zh: 将在其中放置覆盖门户的容器元素。

disableAnimation.description: Whether the modal should not have animations.

classNames.description: Allows to set custom class names for the modal slots.
classNames.description_zh: 允许为模态槽设置自定义类名。

slots.name: wrapper
slots.description: The wrapper slot of the modal. It wraps the base and the backdrop slots.
slots.description_zh: 模态的包装槽。它包裹着底座和背景槽。

slots.name: base
slots.description: The main slot of the modal content.

slots.name: backdrop
slots.description: The backdrop slot, it is displayed behind the modal.
slots.description_zh: 背景栏，它显示在模态后面。

slots.name: header
slots.description: The header of the modal, it is displayed at the top of the modal.
slots.description_zh: 模态的标题，它显示在模态的顶部。

slots.name: body
slots.description: The body of the modal, it is displayed in the middle of the modal.
slots.description_zh: 模态的主体，它显示在模态的中间。

slots.name: footer
slots.description: The footer of the modal, it is displayed at the bottom of the modal.
slots.description_zh: 模态的页脚，它显示在模态的底部。

slots.name: closeButton
slots.description: The close button of the modal.
